languages.text: "В моем разуме сейчас пробудилось все то, чем был Амарнат на момент разъединения. Мы в той точке, где остановились. Но Коллектив Амарнат задумывался как динамическая структура. Мы нуждаемся в новых разумах".

"Everything Amarnat was at the moment of the disconnection has now awoken in my mind. We are at the point where we stopped. But the Amarnat Collective was envisioned as a dynamic structure. We need new minds."
languages.original_text: "В моем разуме сейчас пробудилось все то, чем был Амарнат на момент разъединения. Мы в той точке, где остановились. Но Коллектив Амарнат задумывался как динамическая структура. Мы нуждаемся в новых разумах".

traits.locale_text: "Everything Amarnat was at the moment of the disconnection has now awoken in my mind. We are at the point where we stopped. But the Amarnat Collective had been envisioned as a dynamic structure. We need new minds."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Everything Amarnat was at the moment of the disconnection has now awoken in my mind. We are at the point where we stopped. But the Amarnat Collective had been envisioned as a dynamic structure. We need new minds."

traits.locale_text: "Everything Amarnat was at the moment of the disconnection has now awoken in my mind. We are at the point where we stopped. But the Amarnat Collective was envisioned as a dynamic structure. We need new minds."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「切断した時点でのアマルナトのすべてが今、自分の精神の中で目覚めた。我々は止まった地点にいる。しかし、アマルナト集合体は動的構造として想定されていた。新たな精神が必要だ」
languages.original_text: "Everything Amarnat was at the moment of the disconnection has now awoken in my mind. We are at the point where we stopped. But the Amarnat Collective was envisioned as a dynamic structure. We need new minds."

traits.locale_text: 「切断した時点でのアマルナトのすべてが今、自分の精神の中で目覚めた。我々は止まった地点にいる。しかし、アマルナト集合体は動的構造として想定されていた。新たな精神が必要だ」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “关于阿玛纳特分离时的一切记忆，如今都已在我的思维中苏醒。我们正站在我们终止的地方。不过，阿玛纳特聚合意识采用的是动态结构，我们需要吸收新的思维。”
languages.original_text: "Everything Amarnat was at the moment of the disconnection has now awoken in my mind. We are at the point where we stopped. But the Amarnat Collective was envisioned as a dynamic structure. We need new minds."

traits.locale_text: “关于阿玛纳特分离时的一切记忆，如今都已在我的思维中苏醒。我们正站在我们终止的地方。不过，阿玛纳特聚合意识采用的是动态结构，我们仍然可以吸收新的思维。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Tout ce qui composait Amarnat au moment de la déconnexion s'est désormais éveillé dans mon esprit. Nous en sommes là où nous nous étions arrêtés. Mais le collectif Amarnat a été imaginé comme une structure dynamique, nous devons donc trouver de nouveaux esprits. »
languages.original_text: "Everything Amarnat was at the moment of the disconnection has now awoken in my mind. We are at the point where we stopped. But the Amarnat Collective was envisioned as a dynamic structure. We need new minds."

traits.locale_text: « Tout ce qui composait Amarnat au moment de la déconnexion s'est désormais éveillé dans mon esprit. Nous en sommes là où nous nous étions arrêtés. Mais le collectif Amarnat a été imaginé comme une structure dynamique, nous devons donc trouver de nouveaux esprits. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Mi mente ha recordado todo lo que Amarnat era al desconectarlo. Hemos vuelto al punto donde lo dejamos, pero el Colectivo Amarnat se concibió como una estructura dinámica. Necesitamos nuevas mentes».
languages.original_text: "Everything Amarnat was at the moment of the disconnection has now awoken in my mind. We are at the point where we stopped. But the Amarnat Collective was envisioned as a dynamic structure. We need new minds."

traits.locale_text: «Mi mente ha recordado todo lo que Amarnat era al desconectarlo. Hemos vuelto al punto donde lo dejamos, pero el Colectivo Amarnat se concibió como una estructura dinámica. Necesitamos nuevas mentes».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Alles, was Amarnat im Moment der Verbindungstrennung war, ist nun in meinem Verstand erwacht. Wir sind an dem Punkt, an dem wir aufgehört haben. Doch das Amarnat-Kollektiv wurde als dynamisches Gebilde geplant. Wir brauchen den Verstand neuer Mitglieder."
languages.original_text: "Everything Amarnat was at the moment of the disconnection has now awoken in my mind. We are at the point where we stopped. But the Amarnat Collective was envisioned as a dynamic structure. We need new minds."

traits.locale_text: "Alles, was Amarnat im Moment der Verbindungstrennung war, ist nun in meinem Verstand erwacht. Wir sind an dem Punkt, an dem wir aufgehört haben. Doch das Amarnat-Kollektiv wurde als dynamisches Gebilde geplant. Wir brauchen den Verstand neuer Mitglieder."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Bağlantının kopma anında Amarnat olan her şey, zihnimde uyanmış durumda. Vaktinde durduğumuz noktadayız. Amarnat Bütünlüğü, dinamik bir yapı tasavvur etmişti. Yeni zihinlere ihtiyacımız var."
languages.original_text: "Everything Amarnat was at the moment of the disconnection has now awoken in my mind. We are at the point where we stopped. But the Amarnat Collective was envisioned as a dynamic structure. We need new minds."

traits.locale_text: "Bağlantının kopma anında Amarnat olan her şey, zihnimde uyanmış durumda. Durduğumuz noktadayız ama Amarnat Bütünlüğü, dinamik bir yapı tasavvur etmişti. Yeni zihinlere ihtiyacımız var."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
